```{r, loading packages, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
#Adding the required packages for this file. Don't change the current order, and add new packages to the first.
packages <- c(
  "ggplot2", 
  "tidyverse", 
  "dplyr",
  "corrplot",
  "Hmisc"
  ) 
if (length(setdiff(packages, rownames(installed.packages()))) > 0) {
  install.packages(setdiff(packages, rownames(installed.packages())))
  lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE)
} else {
  lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE)
}
```

```{r}
setwd(defaultdir)
Fake <- read.csv(paste(defaultdir,"/data/", "Fake.csv",sep=""),
                          header = TRUE,sep = ",")
Fake_plot <- ggplot(Fake,aes(x=Average_VVI,y=Average_Salinity)) +
  geom_text(label=Fake$Year,hjust=0, vjust=-1) + 
  geom_point(aes(colour= MarshClass, shape = MarshClass), alpha = 1, size = 3) + 
  labs(x="Salinity", y= "Vegetation Volum Index (VVI)") 
Fake_plot


```
